attributes.background: Legalise the hunting/killing of badgers in Scotland.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the protection of badgers in Scotland are a matter for the Scottish Government and Parliament, not the UK Government or Parliament.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Scottish Parliament, you can find out more here:

http://www.scottish.parliament.uk/gettinginvolved/petitions/index.aspx
